snippet: As the Jets desperately tried to salvage the season late in their game against the Dolphins, Santonio Holmes, a team captain, was on the bench.
abstract: New York Jets receiver and team captain Santonio Holmes is benched during loss to Miami Dolphins after skirmish in the huddle between Holmes and his teammates, who were unhappy with his demeanor and lack of effort.
lead_paragraph: As the Jets desperately tried to salvage the season late in their game against the Dolphins, Santonio Holmes, a team captain, was on the bench.

headline.seo: Santonio Holmes is Center of Discord in Jets Loss
headline.main: Holmes Ends His Season on Sideline
headline.print_headline: Holmes Ends His Season On Sideline
